Question: Between 1900 and 1901, this person completed four houses which have since been considered the onset of the "Prairie style".
Hints: This person attended a Madison high school, but there is no evidence he ever graduated.
This person authored 20 books and many articles and was a popular lecturer in the United States and in Europe.
The "as-built" design was carried out by this person's apprentice Tony Puttnam.
